rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a small reception area leading to the living space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light and ventilation; minimalist design.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Secluded dining space adjacent to the kitchen, following minimalist aesthetics.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, minimalistic kitchen integrated with smart storage solutions.

rooms.name: Utility Closet
rooms.description: Essential closet for cleaning supplies and utilities; built-in minimalist design.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window to enhance natural lighting.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample window space for ventilation and natural light; designed in minimalist style.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Integrated bathroom with ensuite design featuring floor-to-ceiling windows where permissible.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated study area designed to optimize space and natural light; minimalist decor.

openings.description: Minimalist staircase ensuring easy access between floors.
Floor-to-ceiling window to enhance light and ventilation in the bedroom.
